verses.verse: "You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H4729>burn<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H6213>on.<s%> You shall make it of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood.<s%>

Its <S%H753>length<s%> shall be a <S%H520>cubit,<s%> and its <S%H7341>breadth<s%> a <S%H520>cubit.<s%> It shall be <S%H7251>square,<s%> and its <S%H6967>height<s%> shall be two <S%H520>cubits.<s%> Its horns shall be of one piece with <S%H7161>it.<s%>

You shall <S%H6823>overlay<s%> it with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> its <S%H1406>top,<s%> its <S%H7023>sides<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H7161>it,<s%> and its horns; and you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H2213>molding<s%> around <S%H5439>it.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> for it under its <S%H2213>molding;<s%> on its <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6654>ribs,<s%> on its <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6654>sides<s%> you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H1004>them;<s%> and they shall be for places for <S%H905>poles<s%> <S%H1992>with<s%> which to bear <S%H5375>it.<s%>
You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H905>poles<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H6823>overlay<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

You shall <S%H5414>put<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6532>veil<s%> that is by the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%> that is over the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> where I will meet with <S%H3259>you.<s%>

<S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> of <S%H5561>sweet<s%> spices on it every <S%H1242>morning.<s%> When he <S%H3190>tends<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps,<s%> he shall burn <S%H6999>it.<s%>

When <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H5927>lights<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> at <S%H6153>evening,<s%> he shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H8548>it,<s%> a perpetual <S%H6999>incense<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

You shall <S%H5927>offer<s%> no <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> on <S%H5930>it,<s%> nor burnt offering, nor meal <S%H4503>offering;<s%> and you shall <S%H5258>pour<s%> no drink offering on <S%H5262>it.<s%>

<S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> on its <S%H7161>horns<s%> <S%H259>once<s%> in the <S%H8141>year;<s%> with the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> of <S%H3725>atonement<s%> <S%H259>once<s%> in the <S%H8141>year<s%> he shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for it throughout your <S%H1755>generations.<s%> It is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"When you <S%H5375>take<s%> a <S%H7218>census<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> according to those who are <S%H6485>numbered<s%> among <S%H376>them,<s%> then each man shall <S%H5414>give<s%> a <S%H3724>ransom<s%> for his <S%H5315>soul<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> when you <S%H6485>number<s%> <S%H5063>them;<s%> that there be no plague among them when you number <S%H6485>them.<s%>

They shall <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H5674>this,<s%> everyone who passes <S%H5921>over<s%> to those who are <S%H6485>numbered,<s%> <S%H4276>half<s%> a <S%H8255>shekel<s%> after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary;<s%> (the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> is <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H1626>gerahs;<s%>) <S%H4276>half<s%> a <S%H8255>shekel<s%> for an <S%H8641>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Everyone who <S%H5674>passes<s%> over to those who are <S%H6485>numbered,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H5414>upward,<s%> shall give the <S%H8641>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

The <S%H6223>rich<s%> shall not give <S%H7235>more,<s%> and the <S%H1800>poor<s%> shall not give <S%H4591>less,<s%> than the <S%H4276>half<s%> <S%H8255>shekel,<s%> when they <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H8641>offering<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for your <S%H5315>souls.<s%>

You shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H3725>atonement<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and shall <S%H5414>appoint<s%> it for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting;<s%> that it may be a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for your <S%H5315>souls.<s%>"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"You shall also <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H3595>basin<s%> of <S%H5178>brass,<s%> and its <S%H3653>base<s%> of <S%H5178>brass,<s%> in which to <S%H7364>wash.<s%> You shall <S%H5414>put<s%> it between the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> water in <S%H4325>it.<s%>
<S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> and their feet in <S%H7272>it.<s%>

When they <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> they shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> with <S%H4325>water,<s%> that they not <S%H4191>die;<s%> or when they come <S%H5066>near<s%> to the <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H8334>minister,<s%> to burn an <S%H6999>offering<s%> made by <S%H801>fire<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

So they shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> and their <S%H7272>feet,<s%> that they not <S%H4191>die:<s%> and it shall be a <S%H2706>statute<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> to <S%H2233>them,<s%> even to him and to his descendants throughout their <S%H1755>generations.<s%>"
Moreover <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"Also <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H7218>fine<s%> <S%H1314>spices:<s%> of <S%H1865>liquid<s%> <S%H4753>myrrh,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H1314>shekels;<s%> and of fragrant <S%H7076>cinnamon<s%> <S%H4276>half<s%> as <S%H4276>much,<s%> even two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty;<s%> and of <S%H1314>fragrant<s%> <S%H7070>cane,<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty;<s%>
and of <S%H6916>cassia<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary;<s%> and a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> it a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> a <S%H7545>perfume<s%> <S%H4842>compounded<s%> after the <S%H4639>art<s%> of the <S%H7543>perfumer:<s%> it shall be a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil.<s%>
You shall use it to <S%H4886>anoint<s%> the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%>
the <S%H7979>table<s%> and all its <S%H3627>articles,<s%> the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> and its <S%H3627>accessories,<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H7004>incense,<s%>
the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> with all its <S%H3627>utensils,<s%> and the <S%H3595>basin<s%> with its <S%H3653>base.<s%>
You shall <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> <S%H6944>them,<s%> that they may be most <S%H6944>holy.<s%> Whatever <S%H5060>touches<s%> them shall be <S%H6944>holy.<s%>
You shall <S%H4886>anoint<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> <S%H3547>them,<s%> that they may minister to me in the priest's office.

You shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H6944><s%> 'This shall be a holy <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> to me throughout your <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

It shall not be <S%H3251>poured<s%> on <S%H120>man<s%>'s <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> neither shall you <S%H6213>make<s%> any like <S%H4971>it,<s%> according to its composition: it is <S%H6944>holy.<s%> It shall be holy to <S%H6944>you.<s%>
<S%H834>Whoever<s%> compounds any like <S%H834>it,<s%> or whoever <S%H5414>puts<s%> any of it on a <S%H2114>stranger,<s%> he shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from his <S%H5971>people.<s%>'"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3947>"Take<s%> to yourself sweet <S%H5561>spices,<s%> <S%H5198>gum<s%> <S%H7827>resin,<s%> and onycha, and <S%H2464>galbanum;<s%> <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H5561>spices<s%> with <S%H2134>pure<s%> <S%H3828>frankincense:<s%> there shall be an <S%H905>equal<s%> weight of <S%H905>each;<s%>

and you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> of <S%H7004>it,<s%> a perfume after the <S%H4639>art<s%> of the <S%H7543>perfumer,<s%> <S%H4414>seasoned<s%> with <S%H2889>salt,<s%> pure and <S%H6944>holy:<s%>

and you shall <S%H7833>beat<s%> some of it very <S%H1854>small,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> some of it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> in the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> where I will <S%H3259>meet<s%> with <S%H6944>you.<s%> It shall be to you most <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

The <S%H7004>incense<s%> which you shall <S%H6213>make,<s%> according to its <S%H4971>composition<s%> you shall not <S%H6213>make<s%> for <S%H6944>yourselves:<s%> it shall be to you holy for <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
<S%H834>Whoever<s%> shall <S%H6213>make<s%> any like <S%H7306>that,<s%> to smell of <S%H3772>it,<s%> he shall be cut off from his <S%H5971>people.<s%>"
